title: Solving Africa's Healthcare Data Crisis
text: Across Africa, 78% of patients have experienced lost medical records, while healthcare facilities waste 15-20% of their budgets on record storage. BEDA's mission is to eliminate these inefficiencies through intelligent technology solutions. Our MedLink platform and analytics expertise transform fragmented, paper-based systems into connected, patient-controlled digital ecosystems that save lives, reduce costs, and improve health outcomes for millions across the continent.
